title: Can someone please confirm or deny
body:
I was under the impression that fiddle sticks fear (q) had rightly been nerfed to hit a champion only once each? 
http://plays.tv/video/58035d72a2f641b0db/um-hello-riot-really-
..................... =-\

replies.body: I believe your referring to fiddles E (at least that's what your showing in the video) and no, it still can hit champions multiple times its just the silence can only be applied once

There was also the nerf that if there is another target the e wont hit the champ more than once but in this case there was only garen and zil in range. 

Im pretty sure thats y he didnt understand
